column4: hi, im having a bit of trouble.. cant seem to get to any shares that i have on my windows 7 pc... currently using ubuntu 9.10... just hangs when i try and view workgroup
in the file browser in gnome, can you type 'smb://<windows 7 computer name>' in the address bar and get a list of shares?
if i type in smb://homer  just get a hang for a few minutes, then a message saying cannot connect
